scripts.pre-build-prisma: [ -f src/db/schema.prisma ] && cp src/db/schema.prisma dist/db/schema.prisma || echo 'schema.prisma not found, skipping copy' && [ -d src/db/migrations ] && rm -rf dist/db/migrations && cp -r src/db/migrations dist/db/migrations || echo 'migrations directory not found, skipping copy' && prisma migrate deploy && yarn prisma-generate
scripts.post-build: yarn post-build-message-signing && yarn post-build-email-templates && yarn post-build-censor
scripts.post-build-message-signing: WPATH="auth/message_signing/rust/pkg" && mkdir -p dist/$WPATH && cp src/$WPATH/*.wasm dist/$WPATH/ && cp src/$WPATH/*.json dist/$WPATH/ && [ -f src/$WPATH/emurgo_message_signing.js ] && cp src/$WPATH/emurgo_message_signing.js dist/$WPATH/ || echo 'emurgo_message_signing.js not found, skipping copy'
scripts.post-build-email-templates: [ -d src/notify/email/templates ] && cp -R src/notify/email/templates dist/notify/email/ || echo 'email templates directory not found, skipping copy'
scripts.post-build-censor: [ -f src/utils/censorDictionary.txt ] && cp src/utils/censorDictionary.txt dist/utils/censorDictionary.txt || echo 'censorDictionary.txt not found, skipping copy'
scripts.start-development: yarn pre-build && yarn build && nodemon --experimental-modules --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 dist/index.js
scripts.graphql-generate: graphql-codegen --config codegen.yml && sed -i 's/__typename?:/__typename:/g' generatedTypes.ts && mv generatedTypes.ts ../shared/consts/src/graphqlTypes.ts
